artifacts.purpose: Primary executable entry point for orchestrating pipeline phases.
dependency_assumptions: Will import pipeline package modules once implemented
CLI/runtime parameters will be forwarded to experiment runner

artifacts.purpose: Expected orchestration handoff/task definition artifact (referenced in rubric acceptance criteria).
dependency_assumptions: Research workflow assumes orchestrator status is represented in research_rubric.json as fallback

artifacts.purpose: Store reproducible PNG figures for diagnostics, benchmarks, and ranking plots.
dependency_assumptions: Files should be derivable from JSON results using fixed seed=42

artifacts.purpose: Store structured experiment outputs, metrics, and synthesis notes as JSON.
dependency_assumptions: Each rubric item should emit at least one JSON artifact
Schema must include item_id, acceptance checks, and provenance
